overview: Ahead of the divorce trial with her husband, Silvi wanted to change her current hairstyle with a new haircut. However, the conversation that Silvi had with the salon keeper, as well as some of the hairstyles she saw in the catalog book, triggers a sudden collection of memories between Silvi and her husband. This makes Silvi reconsider what she really wants and needs.
title: Tiada Rasa Menyesal di Salon
